location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'APPENDIX B PREFABRICATED HUTTING AT RAS- EL- HADD'

mods.abstract: Plan of prefabricated hutting at Ras El Hadd (Ras Al Hadd) landing ground at Salalah, Oman. The plan highlights the following buildings:1. Power House2. European staff quarter3. Indian staff quarter4. Kitchen store5. W/T & met station6. W/T & general store7. Petrol stores8. Generator house9. W/T receiving & transmitting stations for R. A. F.The plan is prepared by G S Cooper, Civil Engineer, Air Headquarters, Iraq as part of a report titled ‘REPORT ON SOUTH ARABIAN COAST- INSPECTION TOUR- SEPTEMBER, 1942.’ The plan itself is marked as Appendix B.
